quote: A life of frustration is inevitable for any coach whose main enjoyment is winning.
Ambition is a lust that is never quenched, but grows more inflamed and madder by enjoyment.
Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
A life of frustration is inevitable for any coach whose main enjoyment is winning.
Ambition is a lust that is never quenched, but grows more inflamed and madder by enjoyment.
Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
Concentration, Confidence, Competitive urge, Capacity for enjoyment.
Enjoyment is not a goal, it is a feeling that accompanies important ongoing activity.
I have always said and felt that true enjoyment can not be described.
Learning is pleasurable but doing is the height of enjoyment.
Life is a progress from want to want, not from enjoyment to enjoyment.
Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic.
Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
Not enjoyment and not sorrow, is our destined end or way; but to act that each tomorrow find us farther than today.
Not enjoyment, and not sorrow is our destined way, but to act that each tomorrow may find us further than today.
Only mediocrity of enjoyment is allowed to man.
Pain is such an uncomfortable feeling that even a tiny amount of it is enough to ruin every enjoyment.
The dynamics of capitalism is postponement of enjoyment to the constantly postponed future.
The enjoyment of life would be instantly gone if you removed the possibility of doing something.
The lesson adults can learn here is that the world is filled with things for our enjoyment.
The secret of reaping the greatest fruitfulness and the greatest enjoyment from life is to liver dangerously.
True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
